channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 保险商信安金融的利润因保费和投资收益增加而上升
item.description: Insurer Principal Financial's profit rises on higher premiums, investment income reut.rs/3SX9PAD

item.title: 观看：在本周可能影响美联储政策的两份美国通胀报告公布之前，股市涨跌不一
item.description: WATCH: Stocks finished mixed ahead of two US inflation reports this week that could influence Federal Reserve policy reut.rs/48hWRSa

item.title: 对冲基金在 "几乎没有恐慌 "的市场中购买股票，高盛称
item.description: HEDGE FLOW Hedge funds buy stocks amid 'almost no panic' market, says Goldman reut.rs/3UWburF

item.title: 观看：美国监管机构要求花旗集团紧急修改其衡量贸易伙伴违约风险的方式。这只是该银行面临的几个问题之一
item.description: WATCH: US regulators have asked Citigroup for urgent changes to the way it measures default risk of its trading partners. This is just one of several issues the bank is facing reut.rs/3uv3Md6

item.title: 麦格理公布九个月利润下降，称大宗商品主管将离职
item.description: Macquarie posts lower nine-month profit, says commodities head to step down reut.rs/3UDh9Cs

item.title: 观看：2023 年，北美公司购买的机器人数量将减少约 30%，原因是对经济放缓和利率上升的担忧使其难以证明购买先进机器的合理性
item.description: WATCH: In 2023, North American companies bought about 30% fewer robots because concerns about a slower economy and higher interest rates made it difficult to justify purchasing the advanced machines reut.rs/3SupmWU

item.title: 加拿大黑莓公司（BlackBerry）表示，随着这家网络安全公司削减成本（包括裁员），其年度利润的目标是再增加 1 亿美元。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Canada's BlackBerry said it was targeting an additional increase of $100 million in its annual profit as the cybersecurity firm slashes costs, including reducing workforce. More here: reut.rs/3HVxdIa

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，亿万富翁彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）创立的风险投资公司创始人基金（Founders Fund）正在再次投资比特币和以太币，这表明硅谷对加密货币市场重新产生了兴趣。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description: Exclusive: Founders Fund, the venture capital firm founded by billionaire Peter Thiel, is investing once again in bitcoin and ether, sources said, signaling Silicon Valley's renewed interest in cryptocurrency markets. More here: reut.rs/3OJuCVQ

item.title: 追寻 "下一个英伟达 "吸引期权交易商追捧Arm飙升的股价
item.description: Hunt for ‘next Nvidia’ draws options traders to Arm’s soaring stock reut.rs/3wo4M35

item.title: 观看：在本周可能影响美联储政策的两份美国通胀报告公布之前，纳斯达克指数下滑，道指小幅上涨
item.description: WATCH: The Nasdaq slipped while the Dow rose modestly ahead of two US inflation reports this week that could influence Federal Reserve policy reut.rs/48hWRSa

item.title: 观看：比特币两年多来首次触及 50,000 美元关口，全球最大的加密货币受到降息预期和上个月美国监管机构对旨在追踪比特币价格的交易所交易基金的批准的提振。
item.description: WATCH: Bitcoin hit the $50,000 level for the first time in more than two years as the world's largest cryptocurrency was buoyed by expectations of interest rate cuts and last month's regulatory nod for US exchange-traded funds designed to track its price reut.rs/4bE8gP9

item.title: 保险商信安金融的利润因保费和投资收益增加而上升
item.description: Insurer Principal Financial's profit rises on higher premiums, investment income reut.rs/3w8acza

item.title: 观看：在本周可能影响美联储政策的两份美国通胀报告公布之前，美国股市收盘涨跌不一
item.description: WATCH: US stocks ended mixed ahead of two US inflation reports this week that could influence Federal Reserve policy reut.rs/48hWRSa

item.title: 观看：美国监管机构已要求花旗集团紧急改变其衡量贸易伙伴违约风险的方式，而该银行自己的审计师也发现其缺乏改善内部监督的计划。
item.description: WATCH: US regulators have asked Citigroup for urgent changes to the way it measures default risk of its trading partners and the bank’s own auditors have found a plan to improve internal oversight to be lacking reut.rs/3uv3Md6

item.title: 麦格理公布九个月利润下降，称大宗商品主管将离职
item.description: Macquarie posts lower nine-month profit, says commodities head to step down reut.rs/42FLemQ

item.title: 观看：2023 年，北美企业订购了 31,159 台机器人，比上一年减少了 30%。对经济放缓和利率上升的担忧使采购难以合理化
item.description: WATCH: North American companies ordered 31,159 robots in 2023, a decrease of 30% from the year prior. Concerns about a slowing economy and higher interest rates made purchases difficult to justify reut.rs/3SupmWU

item.title: Breakingviews - PGA 政治高尔夫剧是沙特的特朗普牌
item.description: Breakingviews - PGA political golf drama is Saudi’s Trump card reut.rs/3HVKRv2 reut.rs/3HVKRv2

item.title: 澎湃新闻--特穆像亿万富翁一样挥霍无度
item.description: Breakingviews - Temu is spending like a billionaire reut.rs/42AGn6E reut.rs/42AGn6E

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：蒙迪（Mondi）和 DS 史密斯（DS Smith）再次尝试合作。与 2021 年不同的是，两家公司都受到了电子商务需求下降的影响。@aimeedonnellan 说，这将促使双方达成 130 亿美元的交易。
item.description: From @Breakingviews: Mondi and DS Smith are once again attempting a tie-up. Unlike 2021, both companies are suffering from declining e-commerce demand. That should incentivize both sides to make a $13 billion deal work, @aimeedonnellan says

item.title: 美国运通 2023 年的累计重组成本为 2.77 亿美元
item.description: AmEx's cumulative restructuring cost at $277 mln in 2023 reut.rs/3SSY5Pz

item.title: 👉 从山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）为何以万亿为单位思考问题，到福特（Ford）为何要为电动汽车踩刹车，这就是本周的 "数字"。
item.description: 👉 From why Sam Altman is thinking in the trillions to why Ford is hitting the brakes on EVs, this is the Week in Numbers

item.title: 观看：未来一周值得关注的商业大事件
item.description: WATCH: Here are the big business stories to watch out for in the coming week reut.rs/499I4u7

item.title: 观看：加纳副总统马哈马杜-巴武米亚发起竞选，承诺重振遭受重创的经济、打击腐败和促进私营部门发展。非洲顶级商业新闻综述
item.description: WATCH: Ghana's Vice President Mahamadu Bawumia launched his election campaign for the top job, promising to revive the battered economy, fight corruption and boost the private sector. This and more in a roundup of the top business stories from Africa reut.rs/3P0TkkL

item.title: 力拓集团和必和必拓集团计划与博思格钢铁公司（BlueScope Steel）合作开展一个旨在实现炼钢脱碳的试点项目。该项目最早将于 2027 年投入使用。
item.description: Rio Tinto and BHP Group plan to collaborate with BlueScope Steel on a pilot project aimed at decarbonizing steelmaking. The project could be commissioned as early as 2027 reut.rs/48gZOT8

item.title: 观看：知情人士透露，英伟达正在建立一个新的业务部门，专注于为云计算公司和其他公司设计定制芯片，包括先进的人工智能处理器
item.description: WATCH: Nvidia is building a new business unit focused on designing custom chips including advanced artificial intelligence processors for cloud computing firms and others, sources said reut.rs/3SzMnYP

item.title: 裁员范围超出科技行业
item.description: Job cuts spill beyond tech sector reut.rs/42BJ5sy

item.title: 法国化妆品巨头欧莱雅公布第四季度销售增长低于市场预期，反映出其在亚洲市场的表现令人失望，随后该公司股价下跌。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Shares of French cosmetic giant L'Oreal fell after the company reported fourth quarter sales growth fell short of market expectations, reflecting a disappointing performance in Asia. More here: reut.rs/49qV5PO

item.title: 马斯克的 Neuralink 公司将注册地改为内华达州
item.description: Musk's Neuralink switches location of incorporation to Nevada reut.rs/49uN6Bb

item.title: Birkin 手袋制造商爱马仕（Hermes）计划今年再次提价，因其销售额超过竞争对手，股价创下历史新高。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Birkin bag maker Hermes plans to raise prices again this year after shares rise to a record high as booming sales outpace rivals. More here: reut.rs/496RZ3O
